summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements for the admin dashboard feature. The backend now includes status tracking with update functions, the frontend implements a complete admin dashboard with table display and status management, routing is properly configured, and React Query hooks are integrated for data fetching and mutations. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for handling data structure updates
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention any migration functionality or requirement to handle existing booking data migration. This appears to be an implementation detail that was added but not requested.

While the dashboard is required, a manual refresh button was not specifically requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest only mentions automatic refreshing after status changes via React Query invalidation.
Toast notifications (using sonner library) for success/error feedback were not mentioned in any requirement or acceptance criteria. While they enhance UX, they were not explicitly requested.
